entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
